I'm a software engineer (graduating Dec 2024) looking for a great job in SF starting 2025.

Currently, I'm in my final semester studying CS at UIC.

This summer, I was a SWE intern at Snapchat as part of their User Understanding team. Tasked with building and migrating DAGs (data pipelies) that run scheduled ETL jobs, I learned how to work with AWS, GCP, Apache Airflow, and Spark.

Last summer, I was as a SWE intern at McDonald's and part of Snap Engineering Academy :)
